step_1.description: Defined PD mechanism involving Lewy bodies and SNCA mutations.

step_2.description: In vitro model with toxin exposure mirrors PD pathogenesis.

step_3a.description: Controls (wt vs. mutants) not explicitly stated.

step_3b.description: Cell culture and toxin exposure are standard PD methodologies.

step_3c.description: No explicit use of known pathogenic/benign variant controls.

step_4a.description: No OddsPath values or statistical details reported.
